channel.title: Frozenbyte Collection on steam
channel.description:
[url]https://store.steampowered.com/sub/6957/[/url]
What do you guys think about these games steam has up as a deal. 3 games for $4.50
Shadowgrounds, Shadowgrounds Survivor, Trine
I watched the trailer on them all and they don't look bad.
How many of you would buy it?
